2018/KER/944
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
Dated this the 9" day of January, 2018
ORDER
CC.658/2017 of the court below is the main case
and the trial in the said case has been stayed through
Annexure-lll order passed by this Court. It seems that as
per Annexure-lV proceedings, the court below has framed
charges in CC.661/2017, which is the counter case and
summons has been issued to CWs 1 to 3.

2. The proceedings in CC.661/2017 of the court
below are also stayed so long as the order of stay in
CC.658/2017 continues.

With the said direction, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of.

Sd/-
(B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE)
aks/09/01
// True Copy //
PS to Judge
